title: Ep101 Hot for Teacher Crimes
description: This week, the gals get schooled on some inappropriate student-teacher relations. Topics include an infamous educator with an unhealthy idea of romance, the double-edged sword of power dynamics, and an unsanctioned field trip with a health teacher. Pour yourself a big ol' glass of Winc's Summer Water Ros√©, finish up your homework, and tune in for Hot for Teacher Crimes.
